Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.events.data

Class BaseEvent

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.events.data.Event
it.polimi.ingsw.events.data.BaseEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BotTurnEvent, ChangeBotDifficultyEvent, ClientDisconnectedEvent, ContinueGameEvent, EndGameEvent, EndGameResultsEvent, GameResumeEvent, GameResumingWarningEvent, HandChangedEvent, JoinGameEvent, JoinGameResponseEvent, JoinOnGoingGameEvent, NewTurnEvent, PingEvent, PlaceCardEvent, PongEvent, ReplaceWithBotEvent, RequestGameInfoEvent, ScoreEvent, StartGameEvent, TableChangedEvent, UpdatePlayerCountEvent, UsernameChangedEvent
public abstract class BaseEvent extends Event
Base class in pattern Decorator. Represent an event that is not decorated. By default, a BaseEvent object is not decorated unless the requiresConnection is set to true
